code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate,Link}from"react-router-dom";import"../css/registracija.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Signup=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[ime,setIme]=useState("");const[prezime,setPrezime]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[lozinka,setLozinka]=useState("");const[greska,setGreska]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const noviKorisnik={ime,prezime,email,lozinka,role:"guest"};try{const res=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/users",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(noviKorisnik)});if(res.ok){localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(noviKorisnik));navigate("/");}else{setGreska("Registracija nije uspjela.");}}catch(err){setGreska("Došlo je do greške.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"left",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Registracija"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Ime",value:ime,onChange:e=>setIme(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Prezime",value:prezime,onChange:e=>setPrezime(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Lozinka",value:lozinka,onChange:e=>setLozinka(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Registruj se"}),greska&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error",children:greska})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"links",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:"Ve\u0107 imate nalog? Prijavite se"})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"right"})]});};export default Signup;
